Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 28 of his 37 points in the second half to lead the Minnesota Timberwolves over a 19-point first-half deficit to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 108-106
Others: Naz Reid scored 18 off the bench and Donte DiVincenzo added 15 for Minnesota
Rudy Gobert had eight points and a game-high 18 rebounds
Norman Powell led Los Angeles with 25 points
James Harden added 22 and Ivica Zubac had 17 points and 16 rebounds for the Clippers
The Clippers have lost three of four
